ygData.subject: Re: Sonorous Clouding message
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep I noticed this last night.  Never became visible that I know of.  Also one more thing I noticed about clouding.  I went to sell while invisible and became
ygData.messageBody:
Yep I noticed this last night. Never became visible that I know of. Also
one more thing I noticed about clouding. I went to sell while invisible and
became visible. Then on the next pulse I went invisible again. Gotta love
being a bard. =)

P.S. I was talking to a higher level ranger friend of mine and he asked if
I needed any foraged food or water. I said I forage as well and had plenty
thanks. I got a kick out of his next statement which was "Is there anything
that you don't do?!?" As I said before, gotta love being a bard.

Kurik Nitesong
23rd bard (Sliver from 24 and all the extra pretty lights)
Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 12:45 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Sonorous Clouding message


> From: <kim@...>
>
> Did anyone else notice the "you feel as if you are about to
> become visible" message with invisibility? Of course Clouding
> pulsed again before I became visible. I have to wonder if
> this fix (message 5 sec before invisibility blinks off) didn't
> just make Clouding 100% reliable...
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
